titles.title: Regarding the readiness of the Armed Forces of the United States, and the implications for national security.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Readiness.

bill.summary:
4/22/2008--Introduced.
Declares that, because of U.S. Armed Forces readiness shortfalls, Congress should immediately pass a clean FY2008 global war on terror supplemental.
